title: The Divine Code From 1 to 2020: The Meaning of Numbers
description: This book helps personalize the numbers we live with... from birthdays to holidays, stock market calls to weather predictions, genetic codes to Bible codes. In it you will find answers to questions like:Do men and women really have different numbers of ribs? How many chemical elements exist on the earth? What’s the most mathematically accurate prophecy in the world? Why are some people superstitious about the number 13? What is 666 warning us of and should we be afraid? What’s the Rule of 72 (in the world of finance)? How old is too old (in the world of dating)? The “Creepiness Rule” What’s the Number of Life? What’s the ‘mystery of symmetry’ encoded in the Bible?While the last chapter ends on 2020, you will also discover facts about larger numbers such as “who really are the 144,000 in the Book of Revelation?” and prophetic insights into dates beyond 2020. The final chapters offer the most comprehensive treatment of ‘end-of-the-world’ date-setting calculations you will ever come across! You will learn the strengths and flaws of such calculations and be armed to make your own decision. Get in the know and get prepared for the biggest number of your life: eternity.
author: Steve Cioccolanti
